definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Insulin resistance was calculated using the homeostasis model assessment.
sentences.chinese: 胰島素抵抗性是透過體內平衡模式評估來計算。

sentences.english: It is safe to say that delayed cuticular penetration is an important mechanism responsible for this resistance.
sentences.chinese: 證實表皮穿透率的降低是產生抗性的一個重要機理。

sentences.english: Discuss the effectiveness of sexual abstinence programs in the fight against STDS.
sentences.chinese: 討論在對抗性傳播疾病中節制性活動的效力。

sentences.english: There were difference in resistance by inoculation with different strains of Aspergillus flavus.
sentences.chinese: 不同致病菌株接種，抗性反應有差異。

sentences.english: The resistant plants obtained from experiment were slow-moving both in differentiation and the next growth.
sentences.chinese: 在獲得的抗性植株中，分化及後期的生長非常緩慢。

sentences.english: Willow has good resistance and is especially suitable for landscaping.
sentences.chinese: 柳樹的抗性極好，特別適合用於園林綠化。

sentences.english: The evaluation of the lines resistant to SMV over three years it showed that the resistance was genetically stable.
sentences.chinese: 抗病性鑑定結果表明，獲得的抗性是遺傳穩定的。

sentences.english: Moreover, there had been homozygotes in the population.
sentences.chinese: 並且，種羣中已有抗性純合子個體存在。

sentences.english: Objective To induce a line of Plasmodium berghei with resistance to artemisinin.
sentences.chinese: 目的培育伯氏瘧原蟲青蒿素抗性系。

sentences.english: Induced resistance had wide ranging and no specific.
sentences.chinese: 誘發抗性具有非特異性和廣譜性。

sentences.english: This paper reviews possible role of transporters in paraquat resistance.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要綜述了轉運體在百草枯抗性中的可能作用。

sentences.english: The annular clamped diaphragm is extensively insensitive to jarring or vibration.
sentences.chinese: 環形固定的膜片對振動或震動有抵抗性。

sentences.english: The metabolic resistance of the brown planthopper, Nilaparvata lugens, to buprofezin and metamidophos was investigated in this article.
sentences.chinese: 說明褐飛蝨對這兩種藥劑的代謝抗性機制存在差異。

sentences.english: The aim was to understand the disease resistance of maize varieties to Curvularia leaf spot.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解不同玉米品種對彎孢菌葉斑病的抗性。

sentences.english: The strategy for studying rice blast resistance genes and its application was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 並就稻瘟病抗性基因的研究及利用策略進行了討論。

sentences.english: These results showed that the resistance was RNA-mediated.
sentences.chinese: 結論抗病性是RNA介導的病毒抗性。

definition: to fire/to discharge/to release (fireworks, smokescreen, poison gas, virus etc)
